Explore dataset metadataÂ¶

Perform summary statistics and visualize your dataset metadata

from pathlib import Path
import pandas as pd

Define dataset path and name

path_osmose_dataset = "/home6/cazaudo/Bureau/osmose_sample_datasets/"
dataset_name = "MPSU"
campaign_name = ""

dataset_sr = 50000
audio_duration = 30

Load as dataframe your metadata

metadata_dataset = pd.read_csv(Path(path_osmose_dataset, campaign_name, dataset_name).joinpath("data","audio",f"{audio_duration}_{dataset_sr}","file_metadata.csv"))

Display a summary

metadata_dataset.describe()
duration origin_sr duration_inter_file size sampwidth channel_count
count 9 9 8 9 9 9
mean 30 50000 0 3 2 1
std 0 0 0 0 0 0
min 30 50000 0 3 2 1
25% 30 50000 0 3 2 1
50% 30 50000 0 3 2 1
75% 30 50000 0 3 2 1
max 30 50000 0 3 2 1


Plot histogram of durations

metadata_dataset['duration'].hist()

<Axes: >

Total running time of the script: (0 minutes 0.144 seconds)

Download Python source code: 4_explore_metadata.py

Download Jupyter notebook: 4_explore_metadata.ipynb
